item.title: Once again i fail [508]
item.dc:creator: @Nathan8888 Nathan8888
item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

Here you go i hope this works :D.

[code]if (cmd[0].equals(“zerkarmour”)) {
if (p.kills >= 20){
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6737, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10551, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4131, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4151, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6570, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3751, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3483, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6585, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7462, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9244, 500);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8850, 1);

           } else {
	if (p.kills <= 19)

p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,“Congratulations! You just recieved Zerker Armour!”);
}
}[/code]

If this does work can i get your pking system for kills and stuff?

Thank You, Nathan

item.title: Once again i fail [508]
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_girls i pk girls
item.description:
@i_pk_girls wrote:

I stopped playing private server for about 4 months then i come back and forget everything!?

I’m try to make this command

[code] if (cmd[0].equals(“zerkarmour”)) {

			          Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6737, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10551, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4131, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4151, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6570, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3751, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3483, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6585, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7462, 1);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9244, 500);
                                      Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8850, 1);
					p.kills -= 20;
				
                                    }[/code] to be bought with kill points\kdr but you can but it with 0 kdr or kill points so what else can i add to make this work?

As i don’t want it to be free
